body:
Hi Galen,


I just checked to see if that login still works. It seems to be fine. 
Please try again, I know that the server is very picky about white 
space, so if you cut and paste the password it may not work, better to 
try typing it directly. If this does not work please send me an email 
directly and I will send the script via email.


Regards,


-Jack de Valpine




# Jack de Valpine
# president
#
# visarc incorporated
# http://www.visarc.com
#
# channeling technology for superior design and construction
